post:
How's it going, folks! Cyclone Servers has been in business since 2013. We take our hosting business seriously and only want to offer our customers the best services possible to do this we have been recently upgrading our hardware and networking equipment ready to offer the best we can.

Newly updated hardware in our Los Angeles location.

Test out our network with these IPs!

NETWORK INFORMATION:

Seattle WA - WOWRack
Test IPv4:207.244.151.34

North Carolina - Dacentec
Test IPv4: 192.198.92.170

Los Angeles - Quadranet
Test IPv4: 69.12.86.162

Our Features (We have a lot)
- Instant Activation (Subject to fraud checks)
- One-click OS Install with ready templates - CentOS, Debian, Suse, Ubuntu
- Custom ISO - Use our available Windows & FreeBSD or bring your own ISO.
- One-click CP Install - Available on our VPS Panel, cPanel, Plesk, Webuzo, Webmin, VestaCP and more!.
- Additional IPs - Add up to 5 IPs per VPS at only $2 /Month/VPS

Check out our KVM VPSes. Topped with excellent customer service.

We do have some promos:

Promo Code: CYS_5 (Save 25% Off)

KVM VPS (HDD)

KVM 1GB | 25 GB HDD + 1 TB Bandwidth | $5.50/mo

KVM 2GB | 35 GB HDD + 2 TB Bandwidth | $6.50/mo

KVM 3GB | 45 GB HDD + 2 TB Bandwidth | $7.00/mo

Check out the plans here: Click Here

KVM VPS (SSD)

KVM 512 MB | 5 GB SSD + 1 TB Bandwidth| $3.50/mo

KVM 1 GB | 10 GB SSD + 2 TB Bandwidth | $5.50/mo

KVM 2 GB | 20 GB SSD + 2 TB Bandwidth | $7.50/mo

Check out the plans here: Click Here

DDOS Protection is only available in Los Angeles and Seattle!

[Extras] - Now accepting CC. (Stripe) and BTC Cash - We are willing to create custom plans or upgrade individual specifications (such as disk space) for an additional fee. - We own ALL our own hardware. With our Seattle server being a 64 core server!

Please let us know if you have any questions. You can submit a ticket to reach a sales rep here: Click Here to Contact Support/Sales

Thank you!!
